mapper.update: update s_notice set noticeid=noticeid ,noticetitle=#{noticetitle} ,content=#{content} ,noticetypeid=#{noticetypeid} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,noticeuserid=#{noticeuserid} ,noticetime=#{noticetime} ,noticebgtime=#{noticebgtime} ,noticeendtime=#{noticeendtime} ,upflag=#{upflag} ,spflag=#{spflag} ,fbflag=#{fbflag} where noticeid=#{noticeid}

update s_notice set noticeid=noticeid ,noticetitle=#{noticetitle} ,content=#{content} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,noticetypeid=#{noticetypeid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,sptime=#{sptime} ,spuserid=#{spuserid} ,noticeuserid=#{noticeuserid} ,noticetime=#{noticetime} ,noticebgtime=#{noticebgtime} ,noticeendtime=#{noticeendtime} ,upflag=#{upflag} ,spflag=#{spflag} ,fbflag=#{fbflag} where 1=1 and noticeid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and noticeid =#{Where_Id} and noticeid=#{Where_noticeid} and noticetitle=#{Where_noticetitle} and content=#{Where_content} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and noticetypeid=#{Where_noticetypeid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and sptime=#{Where_sptime} and spuserid=#{Where_spuserid} and noticeuserid=#{Where_noticeuserid} and noticetime=#{Where_noticetime} and noticebgtime=#{Where_noticebgtime} and noticeendtime=#{Where_noticeendtime} and upflag=#{Where_upflag} and spflag=#{Where_spflag} and fbflag=#{Where_fbflag}
mapper.select: select t.noticeid "noticeid", t.noticetitle "noticetitle", t.content "content", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.noticetypeid "noticetypeid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.noticeuserid "noticeuserid", t.noticetime "noticetime", t.noticebgtime "noticebgtime", t.noticeendtime "noticeendtime", t.upflag "upflag", t.spflag "spflag", t.fbflag "fbflag" from s_notice t where noticeid=#{noticeid}

select t.noticeid "noticeid", t.noticetitle "noticetitle", t.content "content", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.noticetypeid "noticetypeid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.noticeuserid "noticeuserid", t.noticetime "noticetime", t.noticebgtime "noticebgtime", t.noticeendtime "noticeendtime", t.upflag "upflag", t.spflag "spflag", t.fbflag "fbflag" from s_notice t where 1=1 and t.noticeid=#{noticeid} and t.noticetitle=#{noticetitle} and t.content=#{content} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.noticetypeid=#{noticetypeid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.noticeuserid=#{noticeuserid} and t.noticetime=#{noticetime} and t.noticebgtime=#{noticebgtime} and t.noticeendtime=#{noticeendtime} and t.upflag=#{upflag} and t.spflag=#{spflag} and t.fbflag=#{fbflag}

select t.noticeid "noticeid", t.noticetitle "noticetitle", t.content "content", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.noticetypeid "noticetypeid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.noticeuserid "noticeuserid", t.noticetime "noticetime", t.noticebgtime "noticebgtime", t.noticeendtime "noticeendtime", t.upflag "upflag", t.spflag "spflag", t.fbflag "fbflag" from s_notice t where 1=1 and t.noticeid=#{noticeid} and t.noticetitle=#{noticetitle} and t.content=#{content} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.noticetypeid=#{noticetypeid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.noticeuserid=#{noticeuserid} and t.noticetime=#{noticetime} and t.noticebgtime=#{noticebgtime} and t.noticeendtime=#{noticeendtime} and t.upflag=#{upflag} and t.spflag=#{spflag} and t.fbflag=#{fbflag}
mapper.delete: delete from s_notice where 1=1 and noticeid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and noticeid =#{Where_Id} and noticeid=#{Where_noticeid} and noticetitle=#{Where_noticetitle} and content=#{Where_content} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and noticetypeid=#{Where_noticetypeid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and sptime=#{Where_sptime} and spuserid=#{Where_spuserid} and noticeuserid=#{Where_noticeuserid} and noticetime=#{Where_noticetime} and noticebgtime=#{Where_noticebgtime} and noticeendtime=#{Where_noticeendtime} and upflag=#{Where_upflag} and spflag=#{Where_spflag} and fbflag=#{Where_fbflag}
mapper.select: select t.noticeid "noticeid", t.noticetitle "noticetitle", t.content "content", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.noticetypeid "noticetypeid", t.createtime "createtime", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.noticeuserid "noticeuserid", t.noticetime "noticetime", t.noticebgtime "noticebgtime", t.noticeendtime "noticeendtime", t.upflag "upflag", t.spflag "spflag", t.fbflag "fbflag", ln.noticetypename "noticetypename", bu1.username "spusername", bu2.username "noticeusername" from s_notice t left join l_noticetype ln on ln.noticetypeid=t.noticetypeid left join base_user bu1 on bu1.userid=t.spuserid left join base_user bu2 on bu2.userid=t.noticeuserid where 1=1 and t.noticeid=#{noticeid} and t.noticetitle=#{noticetitle} and t.content=#{content} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.noticetypeid=#{noticetypeid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.noticeuserid=#{noticeuserid} and t.noticetime=#{noticetime} and t.noticebgtime=#{noticebgtime} and t.noticeendtime=#{noticeendtime} and t.upflag=#{upflag} and t.spflag=#{spflag} and t.fbflag=#{fbflag}

select count(*) from s_notice t where 1=1 and t.noticeid=#{noticeid} and t.noticeid!=#{NoId} and t.noticetitle=#{noticetitle} and t.content=#{content} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.noticetypeid=#{noticetypeid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.noticeuserid=#{noticeuserid} and t.noticetime=#{noticetime} and t.noticebgtime=#{noticebgtime} and t.noticeendtime=#{noticeendtime} and t.upflag=#{upflag} and t.spflag=#{spflag} and t.fbflag=#{fbflag}
mapper.update: update s_notice set noticeid=noticeid ,noticetitle=#{noticetitle} ,content=#{content} ,noticetypeid=#{noticetypeid} ,spuserid=#{spuserid} ,noticeuserid=#{noticeuserid} where noticeid=#{noticeid}
update s_notice set noticeid=noticeid ,noticebgtime=#{noticebgtime} ,noticeendtime=#{noticeendtime} ,upflag=#{upflag} ,fbflag=#{fbflag} ,noticetime=#{noticetime} where noticeid=#{noticeid}
